TEXT: Reset all color cards to enable state.
#rWarning: Card pool is too shallow! NL
Lock the ascension level to 15 in the character select screen.

EXTRA_TEXT: Start a run with an Iron Wave.
Changes the game language to English(Needs to restart the game).
Whenever you played a #bX cost card, gain [E]. Start a run with #yFrozen #yEye.
When you enter the treasure room in act 2, obtain relic #yPrismatic #yShard. NL For every card from other characters added to the deck, the time used in this run will be reduced by #b16 seconds.
